_instructions.usage: Copy the lead template above for each new lead. Fill in all fields.
_instructions.daily_goal: 5 leads per day from manual LinkedIn searches

fit_score_guide.10: Perfect match - all required skills, decision maker, warm intro
fit_score_guide.9: Excellent - 90%+ skills, senior role, good location
fit_score_guide.8: Very good - strong skills, right level, decent location
fit_score_guide.7: Good - most skills, potential growth role
fit_score_guide.6: Okay - some skills missing but learnable

example_leads.name: Sarah Chen
example_leads.title: Senior Data Engineer
example_leads.notes: Posted about Airflow optimization, has 8 years experience, currently remote

example_leads.name: Michael Nguyen
example_leads.title: QA Lead
example_leads.notes: Specializes in test automation, mentioned pytest in recent post
